answers.text:
The ICMA model employment agreement is located here: http://icma.org/en/icma/career_network/career_resources/model_employment_agreement

answers.author: Jesse Himes
answers.text:
Hi Joel,
Here is an example of a City Manager contract: http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302035/Manager_Employment_Agreement
You can also find other useful resources in the Contract Management topic area: http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/topics/kn/topic/57/documents
Hope this helps!
Jesse Himes, Knowledge Network Intern, jhimes@icma.org
